3 Tips Mudah Jadi Pemain Barbar di PUBG Mobile yang Harus Diterapkan
06 Nov 2019, 08:09 by Mansur
Tips Bermain Barbar di PUBG Mobile
Oketekno – Gaya permainan barbar dalam game Battle Royale seperti PUBG Mobile ini memang kurang rekomendasi, dikarenakan semakin kalian terbuka badannya maka akan semakin mudah bagi musuh untuk Pick kalian. Namun itu berlaku untuk gaya permainan Solo atau Solo Vs Squad.
Sedangkan ketika kalian bermain secara team, sifat barbar memang harus dimiliki oleh setidaknya 2 pemain. Ini dikarenakan mereka harus membuka map, atau jadi leader ketika rush musuh. Sebagaimana yang diterapkan dalam turnamen, para Pro Player biasanya menggunakan 2 pemain barbar, dimana 1 bergerak di depan dan lainnya di belakang.

Simak Nih: 

Tips Manfaatkan Aim Assist di PUBG Mobile Untuk Senjata Sniper


Lantas, seperti apa sih tips menjadi pemain barbar yang efektif agar tidak mudah ter pick oleh musuh? Para pemain PUBG Mobile lama ataupun pemula, perlu menerapkan 3 hal berikut ini.


Copyright ©GAMEDAIM

Tips Bermain Barbar di PUBG Mobile


Tembak & Berlindung


Pertama kalian bisa menerapkan gaya menembak dan langsung berlindung, jadi pastikan ketika menembak ini kalian sudah punya spot yang enak. Perlindungannya bisa beragam, mulai dari melakukan prone ataupun berlindung di balik tembok yang tinggi sehingga bisa mengintip musuh dengan mode TPP.
Jangan terlalu lama membuka diri, usahakan ketika kalian muncul, langsung open scope dan tembak musuhnya. Kalau mereka menghindar, bisa langsung bersembunyi lagi.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Tips Melatih Kemampuan BarBar di PUBG Mobile, WWCD Plus Kill Banyak!




Manfaatkan Peek & Fire




Copyright ©GAMEDAIM

Bukan cuman menembak dan langsung berlindung saja, kalian juga harus memanfaatkan Peek & Fire untuk mengurangi recoil tembakan dan lebih tepat sasaran dalam menembak. Ini di prioritaskan untuk senjata AR, sedangkan SMG tidak begitu direkomendasikan karena memang dikhususkan untuk serangan jarak dekat yang tidak begitu perlu open scope.


Jangan Berdiam Diri


Salah satu resiko terbesar seorang pemain barbar yakni terlalu terbuka. Namun untuk menghindari pick off dari musuh dengan mudah, kalian bisa selalu bergerak sehingga sulit di tembak. Dan ketika sudah mengetahui musuh yang menembak, segera cari posisi enak terlebih dahulu dan baru balaskan dendam terhadap musuh tadi.
Itulah ketiga tips permainan barbar dalam game PUBG Mobile yang bisa kalian terapkan. Selamat mencoba.

3 Easy Tips to Become a Barbarian Player in PUBG Mobile that Must Be Implemented
Nov 6 2019, 08:09 by Mansur
Tips on Playing Barbarians on PUBG Mobile
Oketekno - The barbaric style of Battle Royale games like PUBG Mobile is indeed lacking in recommendation, because the more you open your body the easier it will be for enemies to pick you up. But that applies to the style of playing Solo or Solo vs. Squad.
Whereas when you play as a team, the barbaric nature must be possessed by at least 2 players. This is because they have to open the map, or become a leader when the enemy rushes. As applied in the tournament, the Pro Player usually uses 2 barbarian players, where 1 moves in front and the other behind.

Listen Here:

Tips on Using Aim Assist in PUBG Mobile for Sniper Weapons


So, what kind of tips on becoming an effective barbarian player so that they are not easily picked by the enemy? Old PUBG Mobile players or beginners, need to apply the following 3 things.


Copyright © GAMEDAIM

Tips on Playing Barbarians on PUBG Mobile


Shoot & take cover


First you can apply the style of shooting and take cover immediately, so make sure when you shoot this you have a good spot. Protection can vary, ranging from doing prone or shelter behind a high wall so that you can peek at the enemy with TPP mode.
Do not open too long, try when you appear, immediately open the scope and shoot the enemy. If they avoid, they can immediately hide again.

Let's Know:

Tips on Practicing BarBar Abilities on PUBG Mobile, WWCD Plus Kills Many!




Take advantage of Peek & Fire




Copyright © GAMEDAIM

Not just shooting and just taking cover, you also have to use Peek & Fire to reduce shot recoil and be more targeted in shooting. This is prioritized for AR weapons, while SMG is not so recommended because it is specifically for melee attacks that don't really need open scope.


Do not be silent


One of the greatest risks of a barbarian is being too open. But to avoid pick off from enemies easily, you can always move so it is difficult to shoot. And when you find out the enemy who shot, immediately find a comfortable position first and then take revenge on the enemy earlier.
Those are the three barbaric game tips in the PUBG Mobile game that you can apply. Good luck.
